problem.markdown: >>Which statement is false about declaration of capacitor in SPICE<< ( ) the positive node is followed by the negative node in declsration (x) there is no way to specify intial condition ( ) both of the above ( ) none of the above
problem.p: Which statement is false about declaration of capacitor in SPICE

choicegroup.label: Which statement is false about declaration of capacitor in SPICE
choicegroup.choice: the positive node is followed by the negative node in declsration
there is no way to specify intial condition
